    <x_snc_amazon_echo_intent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <active>true</active>
        <always_available>false</always_available>
        <category/>

        <intent_ends_session>false</intent_ends_session>
        <keyword>MyRequests</keyword>
        <name>My Requests</name>
        <next_intent/>

        <output_speech_format/>
        <reprompt_speech_format/>
        <script><![CDATA[(function(content, attributes, erb){
	var introMessage = 'Here is a list of your open Service Requests: ';
	var outroMessage = '';
	var msg = '';
	var hasRITMs = false;
	
	var usr = 'f7c7610d13b69200d0143d622244b053'; //For demo purposes
	
	var ritm = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
	ritm.addQuery('opened_by', usr);
	ritm.query();
	
	while (ritm.next()){
		var updatedArr = ritm.due_date.getDisplayValue().split(" ");
		var updatedDate = updatedArr[0];
		var updatedTime = updatedArr[1].split(":");
		updatedTime = updatedTime[0] + ":" + updatedTime[1];
		
		var num = ritm.number.toString();
		var numS = num.slice(-7);
		
		introMessage += "Request <say-as interpret-as='spell-out'>" + "RITM" + "</say-as> <say-as interpret-as='digits'>" + numS + "</say-as> for a " +  ritm.cat_item.getDisplayValue() +  " is in the status of: " + ritm.stage + ". ";
		introMessage += "The requested due date is: " + updatedDate + " at " + updatedTime + ". ";
		hasRITMs = true;
	}
	
	if (!hasRITMs)
		introMessage = "You have no open Service Requests. ";
	
	outroMessage += "To hear the list of requests again, say 'hear requests'. To go back to the status for today, say 'What's happening today'.";
	msg = "<speak>" + introMessage + outroMessage + "</speak>";
	
	erb.setOutputSpeech("SSML", null, msg);
	erb.setEnd(false);
	
	result = erb.getResponse();
	
})(content, attributes, new EchoResponseBuilder());]]></script>
